mapper.sql: eid, ecid, ename, etype, eform, empexam, etimes, eteacher1, eteacher2, start_dt, total_time, eterm, is_active, edescription, last_update_user, last_update_dt,ePosition,eTotalScore
mapper.select: select e.*,c.conumber as cnumber,c.coname as cname, type.ldvalue as type,form.ldValue as form from maritime.examination e left join maritime.course c on e.ecid = c.coid left join maritime.listdata type on e.etype = type.ldid left join maritime.listdata form on e.eform = form.ldid where e.is_active = true

select e.*,c.conumber as cnumber,c.coname as cname, type.ldvalue as type,form.ldValue as form from maritime.examination e left join maritime.course c on e.ecid = c.coid and c.is_active = true left join maritime.listdata type on e.etype = type.ldid left join maritime.listdata form on e.eform = form.ldid where c.coteacher1 = #{eteacher1,jdbcType=BIGINT} and e.is_active = true

select e.*,c.conumber as cnumber,c.coname as cname, type.ldvalue as type,form.ldValue as form from maritime.examination e inner join maritime.scmapping map on map.pterm = e.eterm and map.pcid = e.ecid and map.is_active = true left join maritime.course c on e.ecid = c.coid and c.is_active = true left join maritime.listdata type on e.etype = type.ldid left join maritime.listdata form on e.eform = form.ldid where map.psid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and e.is_active = true
mapper.update:
update maritime.examination set is_active = false where eid in
#{eids}
mapper.insert: insert into maritime.examination (ecid, ename, etype, eform, empexam, etimes, eteacher1, eteacher2, start_dt, total_time, eterm, is_active, edescription, last_update_user, last_update_dt,ePosition,eTotalScore) values (#{ecid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empexam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{etimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eteacher1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eteacher2,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{startDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, #{edescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{ePosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{eTotalScore,jdbcType=REAL})
mapper.update: update maritime.examination set ecid = #{ecid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ename = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, etype = #{etype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eform = #{eform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, empexam = #{empexam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, etimes = #{etimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eteacher1 = #{eteacher1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, eteacher2 = #{eteacher2,jdbcType=BIGINT}, start_dt = #{startDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_time = #{totalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eterm = #{eterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, edescription = #{edescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_dt = #{lastUpdateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ePosition = #{ePosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eTotalScore = #{eTotalScore,jdbcType=REAL} where eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
